headline: Documents Taken Trump Contained Classified Information National Archives Says
summary: Some of the White House documents taken to Mar-a-Lago byformer President Donald Trumpcontained “classified national security information,” theNational Archivessaid in a Fridayletterto theHouse Oversight Committee.The presence of classified information further opened the possibility that Trump violatedfederal record-keeping laws. The letter also confirmedearlierreportingon the National Archives’ coordination with the Justice Department on the matter. The National Archives previouslyconfirmed the documents’ existenceon Feb. 7, saying it had arranged to take possession of the documents in mid-January after conversations with Trump’s representatives in 2021. According to aWashington Post (Lean Left)report, some of the documents included letters from former President Barack Obama andNorth Korean leader Kim Jong Un.While several left-rated outlets featured the story at the top of their homepages, right-rated outlets were less likely to feature the story prominently. Some coverage in left-rated outlets said Trump had “improperly” taken the documents.
